root.name: 3D OrthoViewer
root.description: View 3D data in three orientations simultaneously (XY, YZ, XZ)
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 2.0.0.0 Date 2014-05-12 21:01:55
- Updated to Icy 1.4.3.5 - Minimal zoom support
- Version 1.1.1.0 Date 2013-10-07 15:22:26
Fixed a bug causing the viewer to disregard the user-selected colormap on the XY plane view
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2013-08-22 18:53:54
* Fixed a long-lasting bug causing annoying error messages * Improved graphical interface with support for 2D ROI viewing and editing
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2013-04-25 16:03:28
* Applied similar patch as in the previous version to avoid a bug in the XZ side view creation * Removed problematic test code
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2013-04-10 19:16:55
Finally found the origin of the "index out of bounds" bug. This new version fixes it, although not cleanly
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2013-02-04 11:02:28
Removed debug line (was removing a specific slice for test purposes)
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-01-30 17:11:51
* Added crosshair in side views * Inverted XZ view to match Z slider orientation * Fixed interface behavior: Z slider now updates when clicking in side views * Fixed Z scale not used properly for interacting with side views * Improved performance
Thanks for the user feedback !
- Version 0.2.0.0 Date 2013-01-30 11:36:50
Fixed issue when displaying stacks with missing slices (affects 3D and 3D+time sequences)
- Version 0.1.0.0 Date 2012-12-14 15:24:11
* Fixed several out-of-bounds issues * Side views are now stretched according to the Z/X and Z/Y pixel size ratios
- Version 0.0.4.0 Date 2012-11-15 09:53:52
Fixed another issue when viewing stacks with missing frames
- Version 0.0.3.0 Date 2012-10-30 14:06:29
Fixed an issue when viewing stacks with missing frames
- Version 0.0.2.0 Date 2012-10-10 17:49:20
Look-Up Tables (colormaps) changes now appear in the viewer
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-08-09 10:59:37
